"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547ea5af63687244cd980000#post_547ea5af63687244cd980000
Just so you know Tamers is awesome; Frontier is meh; for the love of god don't watch savers.  Savers is where everything went wrong.  Xross wars is alright; the second season they screwed up bad by getting rid of almost all the characters from the first season entirely.  Xross wars season 1 digimon almost made a comeback, but they the second season pissed everyone off cause they axed almost everyone.

talking about wu tang

its really uncanny how similar danny brown and ol' dirty bastard are

seriously, its like he revived into another body.

both are weird nasal hard to get used to voices, they are both completey crazy, basically doing whatever they want and nobody really questions them, both get trashed at parties, and consume dangerous amounts of drugs, and are incredibly perverted.

they even got a weird ugly but nice look.

the only real difference is that danny uses more electronic beats
